title: The Gulf Between
creator_credit: J. Parker Read Jr. and Anthony Paul Kelly
brief_description: The Gulf Between is a 1917 American comedy drama film that was the first motion picture made in Technicolor, the fourth feature-length color movie, and the first feature-length color movie produced in the United States.

constellations_other.name: Evolution of colour
constellations_other.description: From stenciling film frames through to the survival of Technicolor after Hollywood stopped using it, this Constellation links early cinema to some of the world's greatest films.

creator_credit_for_label: J. Parker Read Jr. and Anthony Paul Kelly
